Key Match Events: Miguel Terceros scored a superb individual goal in the 58th minute.
Bolivia overcame a 20th-minute red card to central midfielder Hector Cuellar to secure victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia's win vaulted them into the automatic qualification places for the 2026 World Cup.
Bolivia's fortunes have improved since moving home qualifiers to El Alto, situated more than 4,000m above sea level.
Bolivia last qualified for the World Cup in 1994.
